potion.name: Potion
potion.desc: A small red potion. It looks like you would recover some health if you were to drink it.

soma.name: Soma
soma.desc: Juice extracted from the Soma plant. It restores magical energy.

cigar.name: Cigar
cigar.desc: The wrapper says "Excelentes cigarros cubanos. Su boca se pudre con deleite!"

drachma.name: Drachma
drachma.desc: A small metal coin from antiquity.
